00017 #include "MisrSetRegion.h"
00018 #include "MisrError.h"
00019 #include "MisrUtil.h"
00020 #include <string.h>
00021 #ifndef _MSC_VER
00022 #include <strings.h>
00023 #endif
00024 #include <stdlib.h>
00025 
00077 MTKt_status MtkSetRegionByLatLonExtent(
00078   double ctr_lat_dd, 
00079   double ctr_lon_dd, 
00080   double lat_extent, 
00081   double lon_extent, 
00082   const char *extent_units,
00083   MTKt_Region *region  )
00084 {
00085   MTKt_status status_code;      /* Return code of this function */
00086   MTKt_Region rgn;      /* Region structure */
00087   double resolution;        /* Resolution */
00088   char *endptr;         /* End ptr for strod */
00089 
00090   if (region == NULL)
00091     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_NULLPTR);
00092 
00093   /* Check extent_units */
00094   if (extent_units == NULL)
00095     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_NULLPTR);
00096 
00097   /* Check latitude bounds */
00098   if (ctr_lat_dd > 90.0 || ctr_lat_dd < -90.0)
00099     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_OUTBOUNDS);
00100   if (lat_extent <= 0.0)
00101     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_OUTBOUNDS);
00102 
00103   /* Check longitude bounds */
00104   if (ctr_lon_dd > 180.0 || ctr_lon_dd < -180.0)
00105     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_OUTBOUNDS);
00106   if (lon_extent <= 0.0)
00107     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_OUTBOUNDS);
00108 
00109   /* Set center of region */
00110   rgn.geo.ctr.lat = ctr_lat_dd;
00111   rgn.geo.ctr.lon = ctr_lon_dd;
00112 
00113   /* Set half of the overall extent of region in specified units measured from center */
00114   if (strncasecmp(extent_units, "degrees", strlen(extent_units)) == 0 ||
00115       strncasecmp(extent_units, "deg", strlen(extent_units)) == 0 ||
00116       strncasecmp(extent_units, "dd", strlen(extent_units)) == 0) {
00117 
00118     /* Average earth circumference (40075004m + 39940638m) / 2.0 = 40007821m */
00119     double meters_per_deg = 40007821.0 / 360.0;
00120     rgn.hextent.xlat = (lat_extent * meters_per_deg) / 2.0;
00121     rgn.hextent.ylon = (lon_extent * meters_per_deg) / 2.0;
00122 
00123   } else if (strncasecmp(extent_units, "meters", strlen(extent_units)) == 0 ||
00124          strncasecmp(extent_units, "m", strlen(extent_units)) == 0) {
00125 
00126     rgn.hextent.xlat = lat_extent / 2.0;
00127     rgn.hextent.ylon = lon_extent / 2.0;
00128 
00129   } else if (strncasecmp(extent_units, "kilometers", strlen(extent_units)) == 0 ||
00130           strncasecmp(extent_units, "km", strlen(extent_units)) == 0) {
00131 
00132     rgn.hextent.xlat = (lat_extent * 1000) / 2.0;
00133     rgn.hextent.ylon = (lon_extent * 1000) / 2.0;
00134 
00135   } else if ((resolution = strtod(extent_units, &endptr)) != 0) {
00136 
00137     if (strncasecmp(endptr, "meters", strlen(endptr)) == 0  ||
00138     strncasecmp(endptr, "m", strlen(endptr)) == 0  ||
00139     strncasecmp(endptr, " meters", strlen(endptr)) == 0  ||
00140     strncasecmp(endptr, " m", strlen(endptr)) == 0) {
00141 
00142       rgn.hextent.xlat = (lat_extent * resolution) / 2.0;
00143       rgn.hextent.ylon = (lon_extent * resolution) / 2.0;
00144 
00145     } else if (strncasecmp(endptr, "kilometers", strlen(endptr)) == 0  ||
00146     strncasecmp(endptr, "km", strlen(endptr)) == 0  ||
00147     strncasecmp(endptr, " kilometers", strlen(endptr)) == 0  ||
00148     strncasecmp(endptr, " km", strlen(endptr)) == 0) {
00149 
00150       rgn.hextent.xlat = (lat_extent * resolution * 1000) / 2.0;
00151       rgn.hextent.ylon = (lon_extent * resolution * 1000) / 2.0;
00152 
00153     } else {
00154 
00155       MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_BAD_ARGUMENT);
00156 
00157    }
00158 
00159   } else {
00160 
00161     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_BAD_ARGUMENT);
00162 
00163   }
00164 
00165   *region = rgn;
00166 
00167   return MTK_SUCCESS;
00168 
00169 ERROR_HANDLE:
00170   return status_code;
00171 }
